latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Buddy system or other accountability system has not been established System does not contains camper identity ability record of coming and goings buddy assignments 15 minute checks
All camp staff have not had recent medical exam including TB testing as required by the Dept
